com.ibm.team.scm.common

Interface ICurrentComponentInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponentInfo

    public interface ICurrentComponentInfo
extends IComponentInfo
    Represents the audit trail for a component currently in a workspace.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.ibm.team.scm.common.IComponentInfo

        DELIVERED_BY_PROPERTY, DELIVERY_DATE_PROPERTY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISyncTime changeHistoryTime()
      Returns the change history time of the component in the workspace
      ISyncTime configurationTime()
      Returns the configuration time of the component in the workspace
      ISyncTime currentPortTime()
      Returns the current port time of the component in the workspace
      IComponentHandle getComponent()
      Returns the component that this info describes.
      long getDivergenceState() 
      ISyncTime lockTime()
      Returns the lock time of the component in the workspace
      long numBasisInHistory()
      Returns the number of basis (including deletions) that are in the audit trail of the component in the workspace.
      long numPendingPorts()
      Returns the number of ports in the pending ports list.
      ISyncTime pendingPortsTime()
      Returns the pending ports list time of the component in the workspace

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.team.scm.common.IComponentInfo

        basis, deliveredBy, deliveryDate, isDivergedFromBasis, isHierarchyDivergedFromBasis

      • numPendingPorts

        long numPendingPorts()
        Returns the number of ports in the pending ports list. If this is 0, there could still be a current port for the component.
        Returns:
        the number of ports in the pending ports list

      • getDivergenceState
